notesStmt.note: Damaged by damp. Stained. Wormed at ends. Repaired and infilled, partially laminated. All edges guarded before rebinding. Degrading ink. Folios 100 and 101 mutilated.

The leaf marked 1*** is a fragment cut out from folio 16 of the editio princeps of bYevamot (Venice, 1522). Some other leaves prefixed to the original manuscript contain poetical compositions, currently mostly illegible.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
